features: MEN'S SOAP BAR MACHO SCENT: Rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul as Age of Sage lets you feel an excellent bathing shower experience with its Handmade Macho Scent men's bar soap. Each body bar soap is made with a distinctive natural soap for men or a macho-inspired fragrance that cleanses your skin while keeping it moisturized and nourished.

PERFECT VALENTINE'S GIFT: Make your man feel like royalty with our set of 4 vegan soap bar care package for him. Enjoy the sudsy indulgence from all natural ingredients like olive oil, shea butter, and essential oils for a heavenly scent. This Valentine gift for him is sure to elevate his shower game and leave him feeling fresh, clean, and smelling like a king. Give the gift of clean with this Valentine's Day mens soap sets.

UNIQUE GIFTS IDEAS: Our 4 individually wrapped soft soap bars in a classic box is for anyone. Just add a ribbon, ready to go as a gift. Have this on Mother's Day, Birthday, Christmas, New Year's, Thanks Giving, House Warming, Holiday Gifts for Men and vegan gifts for women, or just-because pampering items to make that special person in your life feel special after a long work day.

COLD-PRESSED ARTISAN SOAP: Find pleasure with our Raspberry-Vanilla and Wildflower scented, cold-pressed, artisan soaps. Each of our boxes includes two bars, with the same high-quality, premium ingredients: coconut oil, canola oil, soybean oil, shea butter, water, sodium hydroxide (lye) olive pomace oil, sunflower oil, and fragrance. This is nature in a bar!

ALL-NATURAL BODY SOAP BAR: Our handmade soap collection is infused with handcrafted vegan ingredients, including Coconut Oil, Canola Oil, Soybean Oil, Shea Butter, Water, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye) Olive Pomace Oil, Sunflower Oil, and Fragrance. This is nature in a bar!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Masculine Set 2 Macho Set 3 Good and Evil Set

Rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul as Age of Sage lets you enjoy an excellent bathing experience with our Handmade Scented Bath Soaps. You deserve to be surrounded by items as beautiful and dynamic as you, rather than wasting your hard-earned money on cheap disposable things.

Fantastic Gift Idea Four of our individually wrapped soap bars are presented in a classic box - all you need to do is add a ribbon and it's ready to go as practical gift. 100% Natural Ingredients Made with all-natural, organic ingredients including Coconut Oil, Canola Oil, Soybean Oil, Shea Butter, Water, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), and more. Cold Process Soapmaking Our artisanal soaps are mixed and custom-made with premium ingredients. We expertly handcraft each soap down to the luxurious scents and color story. Variety of Soap Scents Stay fresh and find pleasure with Age of Sage in a variety of men's and women's scents.

Utilizing The Power of Nature In Every Bar of Soap Find pleasure in every handcrafted bar of our unique and richly scented natural soaps. We combine the powerful blends of essential oils, herbs, and flowers to create a one-of-a-kind aroma that will wash away your stresses after a long day. We believe in the power of self-care and want to help you live a more balanced life. Our mild-scented soap nourishes your body and provides rejuvenating moisture for softer, plumper skin all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: these soaps and their scents are awesome. Great lather and cleaning. The bars last longer than similar soaps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this soap for stocking gifts and love the fragrance choices, keeping several for myself. I'm just beginning to use my first bar, but so far, I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this soap. It smells really good. That said, I got 2 of the same sets for 2 family members for Christmas and only one of the sets was complete. The other had 1 scent missing and was replaced with just an extra of another one. Wishing we would have noticed sooner, but it'll still be a nice stocking stuffer. Was just a little bit disappointed as a first time buyer, but they do smell really good and the one we opened and tested left us impressed with how it made us feel super clean and also moisturized and soft, so going with 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent scent, lather, & value!
reviews.reviewText: Self confessed soap nerd here, and these are amazing!In fact: Came back to order more & that when I realized I’d not reviewed yet.Rebuying is perhaps the best recommendation, right?! ✌️🎯🤓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They all smell the same
reviews.reviewText: Variety pack without variety of scent. Not worth the money for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this soap
reviews.reviewText: I love this soap. The scents are great. Nice variety and the soap bars last long enough for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Squeaky clean and good scents
reviews.reviewText: Bought this on a whim cus I thought it was the female version of Dr. Squatch, very pleased. I cut the bars in half and lather them in my shower rag and it holds up quite nicely. I feel squeaky clean without my skin barrier feeling tight and dry. The soap scent stays on your skin a very long time. I LOVEE the nag champa soap, the scent is so relaxing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My family started using cold process soap a few years ago to get away from some of the unnecessary garbage in mainstream soaps. We used to buy soap from sellers on Etsy. I tried Age of Sage on day when my favorite shop was in vacation and haven’t gone back! This soap is wonderful! It’s cured well so it’s a nice hard bar that doesn’t melt away on you and it creates a beautiful lather. It has done wonders for our skin and we’re very happy with it.
